com.cisco.pxgrid.anc

Interface ANCQuery

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ANCQueryImpl

    public interface ANCQuery
    An interface with methods related to invoking actions in the Adaptive Network Control (ANC). Clients typically receive an instance by invoking a static method such as com.cisco.xgrid.anc.client.ANCClient#createANCQuery(com.cisco.xgrid.gcl.GridConnection).

    • Field Summary

      static int MAX_POLICY_NAME_LENGTH

      • applyEndpointPolicyByMAC

        ANCResult applyEndpointPolicyByMAC(String policy,
                                   String macAddress)
                            throws GCLException
        Apply a policy to an endpoint by MAC address
        Parameters:
        policy - Policy to be applied
        macAddress - MAC address of the end point
        Throws:
        GCLException - if an error occurs

      • clearEndpointPolicyByMAC

        ANCResult clearEndpointPolicyByMAC(String macAddress)
                            throws GCLException
        Clear an endpoint's policy by MAC address
        Parameters:
        macAddress - MAC address of the end point in which policy will be cleared
        Throws:
        GCLException - if an error occurs

      • registerNotification

        void registerNotification(GridConnection grid,
                          ApplyEndpointPolicyNotifHandler handler)
                   throws GCLException
        Registers an apply policy notification. When a user applies a policy to and endpoint, the callback will be invoked.
        Parameters:
        grid - a connection to pxGrid
        notf - the callback to register
        Throws:
        GCLException
